title: Vom Blick
description: Video exploring the human gaze and anthropocentric perspective
detail: This work delves into a recurring theme that runs throughout the series of works in 2023, relentlessly probing the notion of the 'gaze' and challenging the notion of unquestioningly accepting the human perspective.
technical_detail: I steer the narrative of the video by vigilantly considering when I view things through an anthropocentric lens and when I passively embrace it without scrutiny.
